title: Announcing Android 10!
content:
Today we are officially announcing the latest release of Android,  Android 10, which will start rolling out to all Pixels in the next couple weeks.  

Android 10 is focused on usability, security and privacy, and digital wellbeing.  
Gesture navigation, Dark Theme, and smart reply make using your phone even easier! 
New privacy and security settings have been added, to give you more control over your privacy and location sharing settings with different apps. 
The Digital Wellbeing app will include a Focus Mode and Family Link to help set digital ground rules for yourself and your family.

For more information head over to the official Android 10 Google blog post! 

All Pixel devices will receive the update in the next couple of weeks. 

Thanks, 
Google Pixel Support Team
